member.name: T:FpcCCore.FpcFrameFormat
member.summary: Describes the format of an image frame.
member.remarks: Interop structure matching FpcFrameFormat in fpc_image.h.

member.name: F:FpcCCore.FpcFrameFormat.bits_per_pixels
member.summary: Grayscale bit depth. -1 indicates unknown value.

member.name: F:FpcCCore.FpcFrameFormat.greyscale_polarity
member.summary: Polarity of the grayscale data. -1 indicates unknown value.
member.remarks: 0 indicates that ridges are black, valleys are white. 1 indicates that ridges are white, valleys are black.

member.name: F:FpcCCore.FpcFrameFormat.rotation
member.summary: Orientation change since the image was captured, in degrees.

member.remarks:
Interop structure matching FpcFrameFormat in fpc_image.h.

member.summary: Describes the format of each frame.

member.name: P:FpcCCore.Hardware.HardwareDescriptor.SensorHardwareId
member.remarks:
This property may have an "incomplete" value if either or lack values. The corresponding digits in the hardware ID will then be 0.
If has no value, this property will also not have a value.

member.name: P:FpcCCore.Hardware.HardwareDescriptor.SensorType
member.remarks: This property may lack a value, in which case it works like a wildcard.

member.name: P:FpcCCore.Hardware.HardwareDescriptor.CompanionHardwareId
member.remarks: Only relevant for and .

member.name: M:FpcCCore.Hardware.HardwareDescriptor.Merge(FpcCCore.Hardware.HardwareDescriptor)
member.summary: Create a that is a merge of this and another one.
member.param: The that should be merged with this one.
member.remarks: This function merges the descriptors field-by-field. The merge will fail if a field is specified in both descriptors *and* the field values are not equal.

member.name: M:FpcCCore.Hardware.HardwareDescriptor.Match(FpcCCore.Hardware.HardwareDescriptor)
member.summary: Determine if two given hardware descriptors match.
member.param: The that should be matched against this one.
member.returns: True if the descriptors match, otherwise not.
member.remarks:
This function compares the descriptors field-by-field. An unspecified field in either descriptor is treated as a wildcard, and matches any value of that field in the other descriptor.
The descriptors are considered to match if all fields match.

member.name: T:FpcCCore.fpc_sensor_info_t
member.summary: Information about a particular product or sensor/coating/companion combination.
member.remarks:
Interop structure matching fpc_sensor_info_t in fpc_sensor_info.h.
This type should not be used in new code. Instead, prefer to use which can be found in an looked up using . This is also exposed for a connected sensor by ISensorApi.SelectedHardwareDetails.

member.param: Left edge of the crop area.
Top edge of the crop area.
member.remarks: This method translates all the dead pixel locations by subtracting left from X and top from Y. It then then removes any locations that fall outside [0, width-1] and [0, height-1].
